body.name: CARBINOX Vesta Smart Watch (Answer/Make Calls), Rugged Fitness Tracker IP69K Waterproof Compatible with Android and iOS Phone, 10 Days of Battery Military Durable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 14 mins
features: ⌚ THE ULTIMATE SMARTWATCH FOR HARD WORKERS: We’ve built the definition of strength and toughness on a smartwatch, to meet the durability and resistance requirements of your duties or hobbies anytime, anywhere.

⌚ SAY HELLO TO HIGHER IMPACT RESISTANCE AND TECH: comes with an engineered metal bezel and aluminum body with rubber elements to provide a more successful protection for your rough tasks than other wimpy models in the industry.
⌚ BLUETOOTH CALLING TECHNOLOGY: No phone is needed. Answer and make calls right on your wrist to your most important contacts. We excel at what we do, and you know it.

⌚ LIMITLESS FEATURES: Social media notifications, Screen flashlight, Countdown timer, Music control, Sleep mode, Waterproof, Shockproof, Make and receive calls, Receive and read texts, 70 Sport modes, up to 10 days of battery per charge.
⌚ DOWNLOAD THE OFFICIAL CARBINOX APP: Get access to limitless features and stats for your health and fitness performance anywhere, anytime.
body.description: THE ULTIMATE SMARTWATCH FOR THE AMERICAN HARD WORKER: Most smartwatches are not made to withstand tough conditions or rough environments.❌ THEY GET SCRATCHED AND BROKE EASILY.❌ BATTERY DOESN'T LAST MORE THAN 24 HOURS.❌ THEY START AT $300 MINIMUM!❌ CONSTANT INCONSISTENT CONNECTIVITY!That's why we've engineered the Carbinox Vesta: To meet the durability and resistance requirements to your duties or hobbies anytime, anywhere.SAY HELLO TO HIGH IMPACT RESISTANCE AND TOP OF THE LINE TECH: The Carbinox Vesta comes with an engineered metal bezel and aluminum body with rubber elements to provide a more successful protection for your rough tasks than other wimpy models in the industry.TRUST US, IT'S STRONGER THAN ANY OTHER YOU'VE EVER HAD: is Waterproof, Shockproof, Dustproof and provides an ergonomic fit to your wrist. That's why is the favorite choice for:✅ CONSTRUCTION WORKERS✅ MECHANICS✅ HVAC ENGINEERS✅ TRUCK DRIVERS✅ FIRST RESPONDERS✅ MILITARY & LAW ENFORCEMENT✅ WELDERS✅ RANCHERS✅ CARPENTERSFREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONSCan I answer calls, send messages and speak with the Carbinox Smartwatches?YES! You can answer and dial calls from your smartwatch. For the text messages, you can only receive and read them. We'll come up with new features in the future.Is my smartphone compatible with the Carbinox Vesta?Yes. The Vesta works with any Apple or Android device through our Carbinox App. Available in all app stores.How long does it take to charge fully?Your Vesta will be fully charged after approximately 2-3 hours and lasts up to 10 days within a single cycle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He loves it
reviews.reviewText: Husband loves this watch ! Great battery only charges once a week and wears it everyday to work doing construction and had held up great. Easy to set up. Worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for awesome watch.
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased since this watch performs like the more expensive watches do but at a much more reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this watch. I wear it everyday and use it. The Bluetooth gets messed up from my phone more often than I'd like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t get notifications from iPhone. I followed all directions. Would work for a few hours then stop notifications entirely. Returned and bought a Garmin Instinct 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery and compatibility
reviews.reviewText: Commendable battery life. I encountered no compatibility issues with my iPhone, and all the features are genuinely practical. Wearing it daily, I think this is high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son In law loves this watch! Wow what a valueI would have bought this instead of my apple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great watch, poor app
reviews.reviewText: I like the watch, however the app that syncs it to your phone continuously shuts down. No sense in having the watch if it's functions are limited. App needs alot of work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy for buying this smartwatch. Its has a nice designed and very comfortable to wear on daily basis, the belt doesn’t make my skin to sweat as other bracelets. Comes with a nice amount of smart faces for every wanted style. I am also very pleased with the battery life. Highly recommended if you are looking for a new smartwatch.
